idea-plugin.name: Python Annotations
idea-plugin.description:
Code Inspections for Python Annotations

Code Inspections with quick fixes for python annotations
    Examples
  1. Replace `Union` with `None` with `Optional` 
            # before

        def str_to_int(value: str) -> Union[int, None]:
            ...

        # after quickfix

        def str_to_int(value: str) -> Optional[int]:
            ...
  2. Replace `Union` with `object` with `object` 
            # before

        def some_func(value: Any) -> Union[int, object]:
            ...

        # after quickfix

        def some_func(value: Any) -> object:
            ...
  3. Replace `Union` with one item with item 
            # before

        def parse_json(value: str) -> Union[dict]:
            ...

        # after quickfix

        def parse_json(value: str) -> dict:
            ...
  4. Replace redundant nested Optional 
            # before

        def get_data(key: str) -> Optional[Optional[dict]]:
            ...

        # after quickfix

        def get_data(key: str) -> Optional[dict]:
            ...
  5. Replace Union with Any 
            # before

        def process_data(data: Union[dict, str, Any]) -> None:
            ...

        # after quickfix

        def process_data(data: Any) -> None:
            ...
